import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { MapPin, Phone, Mail, Clock, Facebook, Instagram, Linkedin, Youtube, Twitter } from "lucide-react"; import { Button } from "./ui/button.jsx"; import { Input } from "./ui/input.jsx"; import { Textarea } from "./ui/textarea.jsx"; const Contact = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', subject: '', message: '' }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Basic validation if (!formData.name || !formData.email || !formData.message) { // Simple alert instead of toast alert("Error: Please fill in all required fields"); return; } // Here you would typically send the form data to your backend console.log("Form submitted:", formData); // Simple alert instead of toast alert("Message Sent: Thank you for your message. We'll get back to you soon!"); // Reset form setFormData({ name: '', email: '', subject: '', message: '' }); }; return (
